## How To Verify Locally
- [ ] `npm ci`
- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run test -- --run`
- [ ] `npm run build`
- [ ] If backend/functions changed: `cd functions && npm ci && npm run test && npm run build`

## Checklist
- [ ] Scope is focused; no unrelated refactoring.
- [ ] UI changes include screenshots/video (if applicable).
- [ ] Risks are described.
- [ ] Rollback plan is described.
- [ ] Linked issue/task is added (e.g. `Closes #123`).
